author: ballcock
title: Good Morning Britain fans brand ex soap star Paula Williamson ‘delusional’ as she reveals plans to marry violent criminal Charles Bronson
text:
Charles Bronson and his new fiance have discussed having kids and leading a normal life when he is released from prison related stories Kerry Katona gushes about emotional reunion with her family after Atomic Kitten tour 'THINGS ARE HEATING UP' Corrie's Chris Harper teases that Bethany Platt grooming storyline takes a DARKER turn 'HE'S A HUGE CHARACTER' Will Andy Sugden return to Emmerdale? Bosses tease comeback for the soap favourite ON THE ROAD All the details you need about Emeli Sande's upcoming 2017 UK tour 'DID YOU CRY TOO?' See the epic Twitter reactions as fan-favourites Daryl and Carol reunite on The Walking Dead Back together! Daryl and Carol have a tear-jerking reunion while Rick fights a spiked zombie on The Walking Dead cat that got the cream Beaming Jamie O'Hara drives ex-girlfriend Elizabeth-Jayne Tierney home - in clearest sign yet that they're back together 'I NEVER GET TO TOUCH YOU!' GMB's Andi Peters gets flirty with Susanna Reid as he volunteers to be her wingman THE DREAM TEAM's back GMB viewers' delight after regular hosts Piers Morgan and Susanna Reid return to the sofa Oddball the rage Lady Gaga and Justin Bieber lead the stars getting wacky with their celebrity style tom's in choppy waters again! Tom Daley seen filming for first acting role in horror movie Sharknado 5 after we revealed fling with hunky model while fiancé was away STARTER FOR TENDER Jeremy Paxman spotted looking grumpy with his new love as they are pictured together for the first time following his split from partner after 35 years 
The Sun understands knuckle fighter Charles moved his marriage proposal forward to Valentine's Day so he could go down on one knee after she visited him in HMP Wakefield. 
The former jewel thief sent a diamond ring to her house and crooned the special version of the song, as he asked Paula to marry him. 
He renamed the classic ‘Our Way’ and in a video obtained by the Mirror Online can be heard to have changed the lyrics to “Regrets, we have none” and added they have brought “dark times into the light”. 9 Charles sung Frank Sinatra to Paula as he proposed He sang to his girlfriend as he proposed: “And now the start is here, and so we face our life together. 
“My Paula, I’ll say it clear, I’ll spend my life of which I’m certain. 
“We’ve lived a crazy life and travelled in and out of darkness. 
“But more, much more than this we did it our way.” 
Other specially altered lyrics included: “We planned this lovely day and I saved up for a diamond ring. 
“But more, much more than this, this is our day.”
